head.title: Coronavirus Resource - For Parents - Carteret Public Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of the Carteret School District is to educate the complete individual and ensure the safety and well-being of all community members. Our schools embrace the challenge of addressing the needs of each child and to empower all individuals to pursue their goals within an environment which promotes mutual learning opportunities and respect.

div.p: The mission of the Carteret School District is to educate the complete individual and ensure the safety and well-being of all community members.
Approximately 21,000 people reside in the 4 square miles that make up Carteret Boro.
The Carteret School District is a K-12 district located in Middlesex County, New Jersey off exit 12 of the New Jersey Turnpike.
We are a diverse urban community with a student population of 3,950.

a.title: Click here for Learning From Home

span.a: Click here for Learning from Home

div.a: Are you worried about your child during this very stressful time? Carteret's Elementary Social Workers have created a website full of videos and fun activities to help Parents and Students. They also added their email addresses so you can let them know how you're doing. Check it out by clicking here!
